mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX( CNST_ID ) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX( CNST_ID ) + 1 END AS "newId" FROM TB_PP_CNST_CHART

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ConsultingRepository.selectConsultingChartByCnstId */ /** 차트번호에 대한 차트마스터 정보 조회 */ SELECT CNST_ID , CUST_ID , DATE_FORMAT( CNST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS CNST_DT , PIC_USR_NO , DEL_YN , CNST_DESC , ORG_WGT , TGT_WGT , START_DOSG_DT FROM TB_PP_CNST_CHART WHERE CNST_ID = #{cnstId} ORDER BY CNST_DT DESC

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.ConsultingRepository.selectConsultingChartByCustId */ /** 고객번호에 대한 차트 목록조회 */ SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS SEQ , CNST_ID , CUST_ID , DATE_FORMAT( CNST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS CNST_DT , PIC_USR_NO , DEL_YN , CNST_DESC , ORG_WGT , TGT_WGT , START_DOSG_DT , REG_DT , REG_USR_NO , UPD_DT , UPD_USR_NO FROM TB_PP_CNST_CHART , (SELECT @ROWNUM :=-1) TMP WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} ORDER BY CNST_DT DESC
